Donald Trump - Comprehensive Profile
Donald John Trump (born June 14, 1946) is an American politician, media personality, and businessman who served as the 45th president of the United States.
Key Details & Corresponding Numerics:
Political Affiliation: Republican
Marital Status: Married, Melania Trump
Country of Citizenship: United States
Age: 76 (calculated based on birth year 1946)
Political Tenure: 45th U.S. President (served January 20, 2017 – January 20, 2021; 4-year term)
Children: 5 (Ivanka, Donald Jr., Eric, Tiffany, Barron Trump)
Education: The Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania (undergraduate degree)
Core Associations: 1 major political party affiliation (Republican), 1 current spouse (Melania), 5 biological children, 1 prominent alma mater, 1 U.S. presidential term
Supplementary Contextual Numerics:
Birth Date: June 14, 1946 (month 6, day 14, year 1946)
Presidential Term Timeline: 2017–2021 (4 consecutive years in office)
Public Career Span: Over 5 decades (combining business, media, and political ventures since the 1970s)
